target_note: Base directory where tests are created
ccc_note: The location of the CCC file to use during generation

after_all_multi.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of a corpus text, target and pivot word)

after_multi.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of a corpus text, target and pivot word)

begins_multi.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of a corpus text, target and pivot word)

between_multi.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of a corpus text, target and pivot words)

point_to_multi.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of a corpus text, target and pivot word)

after_all.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of a corpus text and target)

after.size_note: The length of a corpus text does not affect complexity

begins.size_note: The length of a corpus text does not affect complexity

between.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of a corpus text and target)

point_to.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of a corpus text and target)

stringlist.size_note: 2**N (Increases the size of each target and the number of targets)

string.size_note: The length of a corpus text does not affect complexity
